text: ara yena tini janate parena tadera yara kapatata kare, ara tadera bala hayechila -- ''eso, allah‌ra pathe yud'dha karo, athaba a‌tmaraksa karo.’’ Tara balechila -- ''amara yadi yud'dha karate janatama tabe amara nihsandeha tomadera anusarana karatama.’’ Sedina tara imanera ca'ite abisbasera nikatatara hayechila. Tara tadera mukha diye balachila ya tadera antare chila na, ara allah bhalo janena ya tara lukocche.
